overview.en: HOPR (HOPR) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2021and operates on the Ethereum platform. HOPR has a current supply of 130,200,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of HOPR is 0.76414041 USD and is down -4.34 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 17 active market(s) with $1,642,753.01 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://hoprnet.org/.
